channel.description: An open-source Linux-based creative commons experimental rock band. Using Ubuntu Studio, Ardour, and Github to make music.
channel.title: Lorenzo's Music

item.description:
"Lorenzo's Remixes, Volume 1" is a collection of Lorenzo's Music tracks remixed by other artists.

It was released on the blocSonic label for Netlabel Day

The album features contributions from:

  • Spiral Island
  • Love Undulates Violently > Consciousness Rises Above Fear
  • Louis Lingg
  • Nicholas Burgess

Plus, enjoy three unique remixes by Lorenzo's Music, including a special track featuring music by Toucon!

This song is released under Creative Commons so you are free to:

Share — use, copy, and redistribute the material in any medium or format

Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.

Friction © 2025 by Lorenzo's Music is licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0. To view a copy of this license, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
item.title: Lorenzo's Music – Lorenzo's Remixes, Volume 1

item.description:
"Lorenzo's Remixes, Volume 2" a second round of remixes for Netlabel Day 2025 — an eclectic remix of our songs rerouted and reimagined.

We reinterpret some of our songs like “Blue Water Friction (Boombox tape mix)”, “If I Was Alone (Da Dun & I Mix)” and more.

Plus, we also have guest remix by label mates Spiedkiks, Headsnack, and Timezone Lafontaine alongside fellow musicians Velcro Mary and AxWax — each putting their distinct fingerprint on the sound.

This song is released under Creative Commons so you are free to:

Share — use, copy, and redistribute the material in any medium or format

Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.

Lorenzo's Remixes, Volume 2 © 2025 by Lorenzo's Music is licensed under CC BY--NC-SA 4.0. To view a copy of this license, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/
item.title: Lorenzo's Music – Lorenzo's Remixes, Volume 2

item.description:
Friction by Lorenzo's Music is a genre-blurring experimental rock album crafted as a movie soundtrack. Built around a single 3-chord progression, the album explores the question: What if we re-wrote the same song 15 times in different moods and styles? Each track features "friction" in the title, paired with descriptive words like tango, conspire, slippery, and rainy day, reflecting the unique feel of each piece. With varied instrumentation and genres, this lo-fi tapestry ties together in an inventive exploration of sound and emotion.

This song is released under Creative Commons so you are free to:

Share — use, copy, and redistribute the material in any medium or format

Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.

Friction © 2025 by Lorenzo's Music is licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0. To view a copy of this license, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
item.title: Lorenzo's Music – Friction

item.description:
This was an artistic venture to create a project from start to finish, recording, artwork, videos using nothing but open source software. Even the operating system on the computer (Ubuntu Studio)

This song is released under Creative Commons so you are free to:

Share — use, copy, and redistribute the material in any medium or format

Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.

Rom-Comm Mixtape © 2018 by Lorenzo's Music is licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0. To view a copy of this license, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
item.title: Lorenzo's Music – Rom-Comm Mixtape

item.description:
A four-song EP inspired by the music of western films from the 1970s. These songs are a collage of audio by the band created from multiple studio sessions, live video streamed practices and handheld audio recorders. They were spliced and edited together into an arrangement of songs. All of this using only open source and free software.

This song is released under Creative Commons so you are free to:

Share — use, copy, and redistribute the material in any medium or format

Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.

Spaghetti Mid-Western © 2020 by Lorenzo's Music is licensed under CC BY-SA 4.0. To view a copy of this license, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/
item.title: Lorenzo's Music – Spaghetti Mid-Western
